miniapp.name: Spine
miniapp.subtitle: Words you can physically rearrange.
miniapp.description: Drag letters up and down to form hidden anagram-words. Each set is a tiny daily fidget: reorder, discover, and feel language snap into place.
miniapp.ogDescription: Drag letters up and down to form hidden anagram-words. Each set is a tiny daily fidget: reorder, discover, and feel language snap into place.
